Gather.Say: Welcome to the New York City Arrest Hotline for Occupy Wall Street. Stay safe, stay calm, stay respect-ful.
To call N Y C L U Arrest Hotline, press 1.
To call National Loyers Guild Arrest Hotline, press 2.
To dial 311 from anywhere in the country, press 3.
To call the Citizens Complaint Review Board for unlawful arrest, press 4.
To be connected to your New York city council person, press 5.
